      public int dif_choice_gem(Scanner scanner, Game game, List<Gem> gems, int version, fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, int w, int h)

      public static int AskInfo(String string, Scanner scanner, int min, int max)
      Return an integer written by the user.

      min - :the min required
      max - :the max required
      Returns:

    • selectCard

      public int selectCard(Scanner scanner, Game game, int version, fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, int w, int h)
      The player is choosing a card in the game to buy it or the reserve it.
      Parameters:
      Game - : all information about the game
      scanner - : get the input
      choix_reservation - == 1 if the player wants to reserve the card or 0 otherwise
      version - : version == 0 for the version phase 1 of the game and version == 1 for the fullgame.
      Returns:
      1 if the chosen card is present in the game or 0 otherwise

    • visitnoble

      public void visitnoble(List<Cards> Nob)
      Verify if a noble can visit a player and if it's the case he will give him some Prestige points.
      Parameters:
      Nob - the list of all Nobles in the game
